00047       TypeName(const TypeName&);           \
00048       void operator=(const TypeName&)

00088 class setting {
00089   public:
00095     explicit setting(size_t level = 3): recursion_level_(level) {}
00096 
00103     explicit setting(const char *s, size_t level = 3)
00104         :recursion_level_(level)
00105     {
00106         read_from_file(s);
00107     }
00108 
00115     setting& operator<< (const char *s)
00116     {
00117         insert(std::string(s));
00118         return *this;
00119     }
00120 
00127     setting& operator<< (const std::string &str)
00128     {
00129         insert(str);
00130         return *this;
00131     }
00132 
00140     int get_int(const std::string &key, int defval = 0) const
00141     {
00142         return (get_value(key))?atoi(reserve_.c_str()):defval;
00143     }
00144 
00152     long get_long(const std::string &key, long defval = 0) const
00153     {
00154         return (get_value(key))?atol(reserve_.c_str()):defval;
00155     }
00156 
00164     long get_longlong(const std::string &key, long long defval = 0) const
00165     {
00166         return (get_value(key))?atoll(reserve_.c_str()):defval;
00167     }
00168 
00176     long get_double(const std::string &key, double defval = 0.0) const
00177     {
00178         return (get_value(key))?strtod(reserve_.c_str(), NULL):defval;
00179     }
00180 
00190     const char* get_cstr(const std::string &key,
00191                          const char *defval = NULL) const
00192     {
00193         return (get_value(key))?reserve_.c_str():defval;
00194     }
00195 
00203     bool get_vector(const std::string &key, std::vector<std::string> *out)
00204     {
00205         std::string::size_type break_pos, pos;
00206         std::string s;
00207 
00208         if (get_value(key) == false)
00209             return false;
00210         for (pos = 0; pos < reserve_.npos; pos = break_pos + 1) {
00211             break_pos = reserve_.find(',', pos);
00212             if (break_pos == reserve_.npos)
00213                 break_pos = reserve_.npos - 1;
00214             trim(reserve_.substr(pos, break_pos - pos), &s);
00215             if (!s.empty())
00216                 out->push_back(s);
00217         }
00218         return true;
00219     }
00220 
00227     void dump(std::string *out) const
00228     {
00229         std::map<std::string, std::string>::const_iterator it;
00230         out->clear();
00231 
00232         for (it = map_.begin(); it != map_.end(); it++) {
00233             out->append(it->first).append(" = ");
00234             out->append(it->second).append("\n");
00235         }
00236     }
00237 
00243     void read_from_file(const char *filename)
00244     {
00245         std::ifstream ifs(filename);
00246         if (ifs.is_open()) {
00247             std::string line, trimmed_line;
00248             while (!(std::getline(ifs, line).eof())) {
00249                 trim(line, &trimmed_line);
00250                 if (!trimmed_line.empty() && trimmed_line[0] != '#')
00251                     insert(trimmed_line);
00252             }
00253         } else {
00254             throw std::runtime_error(
00255                     std::string("can not open configuration file ") +
00256                     std::string(filename) + std::string("."));
00257         }
00258     }
00259 
00260   protected:
00262     typedef std::map<std::string, std::string> item_type;
00264     size_t recursion_level_;
00266     item_type map_;
00268     mutable std::string reserve_;
00269 
00277     static void trim(const std::string &s, std::string *out)
00278     {
00279         static const char       whitespace[] = " \t\r\n";
00280         std::string::size_type  begin;
00281         std::string::size_type  end;
00282 
00283         out->clear();
00284         begin = s.find_first_not_of(whitespace);
00285         if (begin == s.npos)
00286             return;
00287         end = s.find_last_not_of(whitespace);
00288         *out = s.substr(begin, end + 1);
00289     }
00290 
00297     static bool check_identifier(const char ch)
00298     {
00299         return (isalnum(ch) || (ch) == '_');
00300     }
00301 
00308     bool get_value(const std::string &key) const
00309     {
00310         item_type::const_iterator found = map_.find(key);
00311         if (found != map_.end()) {
00312             parse_recursive(found->second, &reserve_);
00313             return true;
00314         }
00315         return false;
00316     }
00317 
00324     void insert(const std::string &s)
00325     {
00326         int break_pos = s.find("=");
00327         std::string key;
00328         std::string value;
00329 
00330         trim(s.substr(0, break_pos), &key);
00331         trim(s.substr(break_pos + 1), &value);
00332 
00333         if (!key.empty())
00334             map_[key] = value;
00335     }
00336 
00344     void parse_once(const std::string &str, std::string *out) const
00345     {
00346         enum {
00347             PS_UNKNOW = 0,
00348             PS_ESCAPE,
00349             PS_DOLLAR,
00350             PS_FETCHKEY,
00351             PS_REPLACE,
00352             PS_FINISH,
00353             PS_REPLACE_FINISH,
00354         } state = PS_UNKNOW;
00355 
00356         bool brace_open = false;
00357         std::string key;
00358 
00359         out->clear();
00360         for (const char *pch = str.c_str(); /* Forever */ ; pch++) {
00361             if (*pch == '\\')
00362                 state = PS_ESCAPE;
00363             else if (*pch == '\0')
00364                 state = (state == PS_FETCHKEY)?PS_REPLACE_FINISH:PS_FINISH;
00365             else if (*pch == '$' && state != PS_ESCAPE)
00366                 state = PS_DOLLAR;
00367             else if (state == PS_DOLLAR)
00368                 state = PS_FETCHKEY;
00369             else if (state == PS_FETCHKEY &&
00370                     !check_identifier(*pch) && *pch != '{')
00371                 state = PS_REPLACE;
00372             else if (state != PS_FETCHKEY)
00373                 state = PS_UNKNOW;
00374 
00375             if (state == PS_UNKNOW) {
00376                 out->append(pch, 1);
00377             } else if (state == PS_FETCHKEY) {
00378                 if (check_identifier(*pch))
00379                     key.append(pch, 1);
00380                 if (*pch == '{')
00381                     brace_open = true;
00382             } else if (state == PS_REPLACE || state == PS_REPLACE_FINISH) {
00383                 item_type::const_iterator found = map_.find(key);
00384                 if (found != map_.end()) {
00385                     out->append(found->second);
00386                     key.clear();
00387                 }
00388                 if (!(brace_open && *pch == '}'))
00389                     pch--;
00390             }
00391             if (state == PS_FINISH || state == PS_REPLACE_FINISH)
00392                 break;
00393         }
00394     }
00395 
00403     void parse_recursive(const std::string &str, std::string *out) const
00404     {
00405         std::string lhs(str), rhs;
00406 
00407         for (size_t i = 0;
00408              i < recursion_level_ && str.find('$') < str.npos;
00409              i++) {
00410             parse_once(lhs, &rhs);
00411             lhs = rhs;
00412         }
00413         *out = lhs;
00414     }
00415 
00416   private:
00417     DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(setting);
00418 };
00419 
00422 END_SETTING_NAMESPACE
00423 
00424 #endif  // SETTING_H_
